title: Attendance Check-In
subtitle: Use GPS or QR code to check in and check out

qrScanner.title: Scan QR Code
qrScanner.instruction: Point your camera at the branch QR code
qrScanner.cameraPermissionDenied: Camera permission denied. Please enable camera access.
qrScanner.cameraNotSupported: Camera is not supported on this device
qrScanner.invalidQR: Invalid QR code. Please scan a valid attendance QR code.
qrScanner.wrongAccount: This QR code belongs to a different account
qrScanner.qrExpired: This QR code has expired. Please generate a new one.

noBranchMessage: You must be assigned to a branch before you can use the attendance system. Please contact your administrator.
gpsNotSupported: GPS is not supported on this device
gpsPermissionDenied: GPS permission denied. Please enable location access.
mustBeWithinRadius: You must be within {{radius}}m of the branch to check in/out
tooFarForCheckOut: You are too far from the branch to check out
alreadyCheckedOut: You have already checked out for today

reports.title: Attendance Reports
reports.description: View and analyze employee attendance records

qr_codes.title: Attendance QR Codes
qr_codes.description: Print QR codes for each branch to enable quick attendance check-in
qr_codes.info: Print these QR codes and place them at each branch location. Employees can scan them to check in and check out.

empty.title: No Branches Available
empty.description: Create branches first to generate QR codes for attendance tracking.

my_history.title: My Attendance History
my_history.description: View your personal attendance records and statistics

empty.title: No Attendance Records
empty.description: You haven't checked in yet. Use the QR code at your branch to check in.

empty.title: No Records Found
empty.description: No attendance records match your current filters. Try adjusting your search criteria.

settings.title: Attendance Settings
settings.description: Configure attendance tracking, branch locations, and check-in radius
settings.moduleStatusDescription: Toggle attendance tracking for your entire account
settings.radiusDescription: Employees must be within this distance from the branch to check in/out (10-1000m)
settings.noBranches: No branches found. Create branches first.
settings.locationHint: Tip: Use Google Maps to find exact coordinates. Right-click on the branch location and select coordinates.
settings.geolocationNotSupported: Geolocation is not supported by your browser
settings.geolocationPermissionDenied: Location permission denied. Please allow location access in your browser settings.
settings.geolocationError: An error occurred while getting your location
